sections.heading: mediation service; maintain statistical records
sections.text: The farm mediation service shall maintain complete statistical records of program participation and costs and make them available upon request.SourceLaws 1988, LB 664, ยง 15.

2-4815.Farm mediation service; maintain statistical records.

The farm mediation service shall maintain complete statistical records of program participation and costs and make them available upon request.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 664, ยง 15.
